mapper.insert: insert into dht11Data (id, rasPiName, rasPiID, sensorType, sensorModel, sensorID, frequency, collectTime, sensorData, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rasPiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rasPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sensorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{frequency,jdbcType=REAL}, #{collectTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sensorData,jdbcType=REAL}, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: update dht11Data set rasPiName = #{rasPiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rasPiID = #{rasPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sensorType = #{sensorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensorModel = #{sensorModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensorID = #{sensorID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=REAL}, collectTime = #{collectTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sensorData = #{sensorData,jdbcType=REAL}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, rasPiName, rasPiID, sensorType, sensorModel, sensorID, frequency, collectTime, sensorData, create_time from dht11Data where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
